name: Nux (itch)
description:
Hi guys, this is Nux, a new project I'm working on!

This is the really first prototype with only a sample level of a hyper-casual game where the player can hit a "stone" only with the help of a "pendulum".

When the stone reaches the "home" , the player wins the level!

For the developement of Nux , I need the help of fantastic people who want to share with me their impressions about the game!
For this first phase of developement I would like to know:
- Is the core gameplay enough fun?
- Can you imagine a complete game with this basic mechanic but provided of more and more elements?<<< Please, never mind about the bugs, I know there are a lot. But the first rule for a quick prototype is : Whatever Works ! >>>

::::: COMMANDS :::::

<Space bar> to:  

step 1. select direction;

step 2. select the height of the pendulum;

step 3.  drop the pendulum!

step 4. re-launch.

<left or right arrow> during step 1 to rotate faster.

So...  enough small talk ...GL & HF!!!

PS: Can you beat my SCORE?
